original_text: On the lampstand itself there were four cups in the shape of almond flowers and their leaves.
korean_text: 등잔대 줄기에는 살구꽃 형상의 잔 넷과 꽃받침과 꽃이 있고

sentences.original_text: On the lampstand itself there were four cups
sentences.korean_translation: 금촛대 자체에 네 개의 잔이 있었고

sentences.original_text: in the shape of almond flowers
